(89) VIII. The Bills of Mortality for the Town of Dresden, for a whote Century, viz. from the Year 1617 to 1717, containing the Numbers of Marriages, Births, Burials, and Communicants. Communicated by Sir Conrad Sprengell, M. D. F. R. S. The Couples ChristCommuWho receiv'd Buried. Year married. ned. nicants. HolyOrders. 1617 126 478 639 21507 among whom 37 were 1618 175 466 400 22567 31 1619 148 530 332 23221 34 1620 119 546 472 22850 36 1621 146 546 491 23988 18 1622 144 521 381 24032 16 1623 127 541 421 25864 20 1624 146 576 411 25899 15 1625 141 543 481 26319 21 1626 151 580 407 besides 333 29201 27 who died of the Plague. 1627 162 548 412 26677 29 1628 124 543 469 27085 17 1629 136 599 398 28525 18 1630 115 599 480 28446 28 1631 163 599 844 30241 23 1632 161 515 3129 during the 32416 46 Troubles of the War and Plague. 1633 412 425 4585 the Trou27688 57 bles of War and the Plague still continuing. 1634 346 531 721 23165 47 M 2 The (90) The Couples ChristBuried. CommuWho receiv'd Year married. ned. nicants. HolyOrders. 1635 205 523 597 24942 among whom ~ 24 were 1636 153 531 594 23904 26 1637 156 613 1897 the Plague 28888 19 breaking out again. 1638 205 550 531 26744 43 1639 122 602 1845 28702 24 1640 192 451 935 26032 30 1641 144 509 525 25662 22 1642 155 514 601 27247 20 1643 137 623 1041 28720 30 1644 128 561 489 27677 28 1645 118 497 532 27602 22 1646 134 512 481 27996 9 1647 148 655 471 36619 21 In which Year they began to deliver in the Number of Communicants at Old Dresden. 1648 190 714 606 37097 23 1649 179 664 597 39198 21 1650 197 752 494 39588 26 1651 199 713 511 39773 19 1652 206 732 450 40389 24 1653 193 673 535 40924 20 1654 194 691 558 41789 28 1655 180 725 525 40253 26 1656 212 708 560 43086 15 1657 163 610 663 44783 30 1658 186 707 518 43117 16 1659 193 703 599 43297 29 1660 219 738 542 45111 23 1661 196 709 649 45137 28 1662 180 733 637 45313 27 1663 193 640 620 45640 31 1664 176 682 662 46115 42 1665 228 734 699 46667 33 The (91) The Couples Christned. Buried CommuWho receiv'd Year married. nicants. Holy Orders. 1666 188 699 824 47194 among whom ~ 32 were 1667 247 754 823 47325 20 1668 237 739 703 48403 17 1669 215 833 794 48765 27 1670 251 802 776 50121 22 1671 262 844 743 51500 26 1672 275 856 909 51650 32 1673 252 891 909 52483 26 1674 256 887 846 52636 19 1675 257 920 947 53179 25 1676 260 895 1284 51164 28 1677 322 988 887 53079 31 1678 204 1028 1020 53510 22 1679 308 1063 975 55296 30 1680 247 883 1311 56116 18 besides 5103 who died of the Plague 1681 531 791 753 45244 18 1682 386 1137,among whom 1023 51512 21 two Blackmoors Children. 1683 256 1201 1200 52493 29 1684 270 1039 1154 48855 21 1685 273 984 937 50931 32 1686 244 1020 1199 53754 31 1687 285 1078,among whom 927 49040 35 a Turkish Woman. 1688 274 1062,among whom 1011 54868 23 1 Turkish Woman, 3 Turkish Girls, and 1 Turkish Man. The (92) The Couples Christned. Buried CommuWho receiv'd Year married. nicants. HolyOrders. 1689 244 1022 1163 55284 among whom ~ 21 were 1690 370 1002,among whom 1200 57130 26 1 Turk. 1691 306 1119,amongwhom 1166 56629 33 4 Turkish Women, 2 Turkish Boys, and 1 Black Woman. 1692 323 1003,among whom 999 58995 18 1 Jew. 1693 309 1096,among whom 1071 59921 29 1 Turkish Man. 1694 366 1014,among whom 1426 61288 28 2 Turkish Boys. 1695 329 1225 1227 62230 35 1696 293 1162,among whom 1055 64491 23 one Black Man. 1697 480 1206 1070 61171 30 1698 332 1007 919 59030 25 1699 295 963, among them 1139 59662 38 one Black Woman and a Lapland Man 80 Years old. 1700 292 975, among them 1198 59369 28 1 Turkish Woman, 2 Turkish Men and a Jew. 1701 324 991 992 61176 27 1702 210 1086,among whom 946 60225 27 a Jewess. 1703 288 1049,among whom 1078 62636 31 a Turkish Woman. 1704 279 1111,among whom 964 62971 39 a Black Woman. 1705 354 1044,among whom 1346 64262 30 a Jew. The (93) The Couples Christned. Buried CommuWho receiv'd Year married. nicants. HolyOrders. 1706 313 1104 1098 63894 among whom ~ 19 are 1707 296 1034 1523 63120 24 1708 350 1256 1119 66519 30 1709 348 1141,among whom 1340 67021 41 a Jew and his Wife. 1710 337 1141, among them 1214 69197 24 2 Jews, who apostatiz'd afterwards. 1711 313 1181 1222 70123 29 1712 354 1227 1140 72432 22 1713 353 1112,among whom 1383 71600 23 one Turkish Man, and one Jew. 1714 306 1312,among whom 1250 75547 33 a Jew. 1715 349 1249,among whom 1353 76155 23 a Jew. 1716 361 1339,among whom 1274 77146 27 one Black Man, one Jew, and one Jewish Girl. 1717 397 1443,among whom 1908 78019 19 a Jew. Sum Total from 1617 to 1717 inclusive. Married 24294 Couples, Christned 83412, Buried 98611. Communicants 4654064, among whom 1686 who received Holy Orders. IX. The
